channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks | JooYoung Seo: Learning Scientist; Data Scientist; Accessibility Engineer

item.title: Nature, Webcast: How to Learn to Code
item.description: I was invited as a speaker for “How to Learn to Code” at the Nature, Webcast.

item.title: 2021 National Coding Symposium
item.description: I was invited as a moderator for the panel discussion on “How Do University Programs Support Accessible Coding?” at the 2021 National Coding Symposium.

item.title: Accessible Data Science Beyond Visual Models: Non-Visual Interactions with R and RStudio Packages
item.description: This talk has been virtually presented at RStudio::global(2021).

item.title: The Rapidly Changing World of Accessible Online Learning
item.description: This panel discussion has been presented in 2017 AECT in Florida.
